website_summaries.verdict: Solid microfiber choice that will look good and sleep comfortably.
pros: Wide variety of solid colors in stock
Soft with elastic all the way around the bottom of the fitted sheet
Deep pockets that do not bunch on thinner mattresses
Seem to help people with sensory issues
cons: Over time these sheets can have a problem with pilling

customer_reviews.title: SO Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Well I have to say that I am so disappointed. The reviews on these sheets made me buy them. They sounded wonderful...I washed them and when went to put them on my bed the elastic in the bottom sheet was not there. I went ahead and we slept on them for several nights but now they are starting to "pill". The fabric is not high quality, they are not super soft and silky.I was hoping they would be like a set I purchased locally by ClaraClark which are just wonderful! However they are far from them. Returning them now.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Teal-Coray

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I waited until a few washes to submit my review on these sheets. Result is excellent! They look good to start with. The sheets are generously cut so there is no yanking and extreme pulling trying to get these to fit a CA King with 10" memory foam mattress. The pillowcase are a little snug on the large pillows though still fit okay. After four washes they seem to be holding up very well with no sign of wear.
customer_reviews.author: jim odellTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love these Sheets
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets I bought these sheets for my son who has sensory issues and has problems sleeping in the sheets they were so soft I talked him into trying them out and he loves them he has not had a problem since then I will definitely be buying another set. They fit the bed perfectly with out constantly slipping off. I have received many emails from this company making sure I am happy with their product. There is even a warranty you can't go wrong with that who warranties sheets?
customer_reviews.author: Tre

customer_reviews.title: Stays on my mattress and are so soft
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought a split king adjustable bed. The sheet we bought were constantly coming off. We bought these in hopes of keeping them on. They are awesome. They haven't even budged a little bit. They are unbelievably soft too. We will be buying another set!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Habrukovich

customer_reviews.title: Keepers
customer_reviews.text: The absolute most comfortable set of sheets I've ever slept in. Smooth as silk. I've traveled the world and have slept in 5 star hotels in 15+ countries and never, never, have I had a sleeping experience like this. I was always hot at night with cotton sheets but now my body is cool under these. The pillow cases are out of this world when paired with a My Pillow. They washed well and for perfectly. I never tried microfiber before and will never go back to cotton after these. For only $30 you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: NotaHappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive, Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: 2 Month Update: the sheets began pilling excessively so it felt like I was sleeping on dirt or bugs. So gross. Washing them did not help. They lost any comfort they had and they weren’t even “luxuriously soft” as advertised. They also collected heat which became very uncomfortable during the summer. Not breathable at all. I’ve also emailed the company twice to use their “lifetime guarantee warranted” to try and get my money back, but they are avoiding me. Such a waste of money. Bad product, worse company. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Beware, they will pile or ball up!
customer_reviews.text: I should have known better. I ordered these same sheets a year ago, and after several months, they starting piling. I washed and dried them exactly as the instructions said. But they started balling up. I turned them inside out and used a few more months. Since they were inexpensive, I thought, ok, I'll order a new set. They should last at least a year. Um, no. Within 2 months the piling started. I turned them inside out and within a month the little rough balls were there on that side. I can't stand rough sheets. I went to Bed, Bath and Beyond and got a cotton set. NEVER, NEVER again these sheets.
customer_reviews.author: auntjam

customer_reviews.title: They are extremely soft and I love the color selection
customer_reviews.text: I own a very deep pocketed Queen bed, by the time you add a mattress pad you are up there in depth, so I bought mine in King size and there is so much room, now I don't fight my husband for the top sheet anymore. They are extremely soft and I love the color selection. I have tried several brands (6 different manufacturers as of late) and found this one to be the best of my purchases. Since I like to change my bedding motifs several times a month, I will be buying from them from now on. Great colors, great price and softer than most sheets for 3 times the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabetta DiMartino

customer_reviews.title: Terrible - Feel like Hospital Sheets
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new mattress and needed new sheets because it's 16" tall and my old sheets were riding up. These are awful! We were sweating all night, which wasn't a problem with our old Egyptian Cotton sheets, and my husband described them as feeling like "hospital sheets." After only one night in these I'm ordering new ones with one-day shipping - that's how bad it was. I'm so upset because I purchased and washed 2 sets of these and I'm just going to get rid of them. Worst waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you like microfiber, you will probably be very happy
customer_reviews.text: I never leave reviews and decided I would leave one for this product because it may help you know exactly what to expect. There is nothing wrong with these sheets if you want microfiber material. If you are used to 100% high thread count, cotton sheets, these are not what you want. Cotton allows you to breathe and although these are soft and very thin, they are not cotton and sleep very hot. If you like microfiber, you will probably be very happy. It can be super confusing when buying sheets online and so I thought I would help those that still love the breathable, soft cotton, sheets. These may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Cool Nights
customer_reviews.text: The biggest issue I have sleeping is that I'm always too hot. My apartment has radiator heat controlled by our super, and even with the windows open in the dead of winter I'm always fighting to keep cool. I bought these sheets solely to help keep my body cool and they're incredibly effective. I was surprised at the quality for the price- they seams and edges are well trimmed, the stitching tight, and the fabric is a solid weight. I don't like sheets that are too slippery but these strike a perfect balance: not too buttery soft, not too cotton rough.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Coral, Orange, Peach, & Apricot Sheets
customer_reviews.text: Sheets are super soft, but the photos were no help when trying to pick the correct color. From bottom to top... Orange- not orange in the least. I'd call it true red. Coral- not coral, bubble gum pink. Apricot - more yellow than the photos in the listing. Peach- lighter than my bedroom but closest color wise and the only one I am keeping. Top set is also here on Amazon, more expensive, similar quality but the color was the best match so I kept that one as well. Lowes calls my bedroom "Harvest Peach". Hopefully these pics help someone else.
customer_reviews.author: PTX

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sheets for the Value!!
customer_reviews.text: So I just purchased a split king bed and the store was trying to up sell me on the sheets for $200.00 bucks more. I went to Bed Bath & Beyond and the sheets there were $160.00, so of course I checked Amazon, saw these sheets for $50.00 and thought what the heck, I order these not expecting much. But let me tell you, they fit like a glove and are SUPER SOFT!! I love these sheets, better yet, the wife loved them too, so that made my life even better!! I will be buying another set soon. So yes, great service, great product too!! Keep up the great work guys.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ketcham

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with This Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are not worth the price, and are hands down the worst set we have ever purchased in our fifteen years of marriage. We have a queen-size mattress, and these would not stay on our bed no matter what. The sheets are soft but are very thin and looked quite worn after just a few washes and being dried on a delicate cycle. The yellow color we ordered was lovely, but other than that a complete bust. We were bummed out with our purchase, especially after reading all the other good reviews. What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: CraneFam

customer_reviews.title: I love these sheets
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the sheets on the bed a few, so I can't attest to the durability, or ease of cleaning, but they are soft and comfy. But the most important thing is we have an adjustable bed, which means the bottom sheet never stays put. With the deep pockets, these sheets have held perfectly. These sheets are an amazing value!
customer_reviews.author: Marci Mathers

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sheets
customer_reviews.text: We bought the I8 Sleep Number Split King bed a few months ago. I took a chance and ordered these, in the silver grey. These Sheets work just right, and in fact I like them even better than the Sleep Number sheets we bought with the bed, which were very thin and started piling after the first wash. They sheets wash well, no piling, and for the price you can't beat the price for a set of King sheets. They are not Egyptian cotton, but they are soft. Pleasantly surprised with these sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are very thin and poor quality. The fabric 'pills' - which is very uncomfortable to sleep on. They don't 'breathe' and easily cause sweating. The flat sheet was not even cut square - when folding, the ends don't match up. The only thing they didn't do wrong, was wrinkle a lot after washing and drying. I only use them now on my air mattress, but couldn't stand them on my bed. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kael

customer_reviews.title: USED
customer_reviews.text: I received the sheet set USED! So disappointing. Its very obvious that it is a used set of sheets. The sheets were bundled up and stuffed in the packaging, there was no cardboard inserts. I ordered the Stone Charcoal Gray split king set & there was blue fuzz and hair on the sheets, EWWW. Super disappointed. I am giving them a chance to make this right, and will update once the new set comes in. I rated 3 stars on quality, durability and ease of cleaning, but to be fair I do not know how well any of these will hold up to the standard since I received them used and I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set of sheets because the sheets I had did not fit my mattress and mattress topper. I have never had to look for sheets that had deeper pockets. I always bought sheets and they fit. Well not any more. I have an 8" memory foam mattress which I just purchased, and a 3" memory foam mattress topper. These sheets fit the mattresses perfectly and have enough fabric to fit under the 8" mattress so the fitted sheet will not pull out. I would recommend these sheet to anyone and intend on purchasing more. Well worth the price and the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best sheets I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts. They were inexpensive. I have an adjustable bed, a 14.5 inch mattress and a pad. I LOVE these sheets! No other sheets have stayed put and have been as comfortable. I wanted to order an additional set immediately but just to be sure I took my sheets off the bed and washed them. Slept on them for two more nights and repeated the process again. These sheets have been washed four times in less than a week. Color is perfect, no pilling and they don’t wrinkle. Best of all the corners stay put on my mattress and I sleep well. These are the ONLY sheets I will buy now. Just ordered a second set.
customer_reviews.author: RSF

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fitted sheet elastic band
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are ok to the touch and seem durable, but the fitted sheet certainly didn't seem to be deep pocket. My mattress is only 10” high, and the elastic band in the fitted sheet easily broke on the first attempt to fit it on the mattress. That band is definitely not durable :/
customer_reviews.author: C. Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Soft. Well Made. Our Favorite Sheets
customer_reviews.text: I now have multiple sets of these sheets. We matched multiple sets to our bedding so we have a good rotation on them. I love that they have actually lasted a while (2 years so far and no signs of coming apart!)! Truthfully, we have a set in our guest room and our guests always compliment them. They're worth every penny and let's be honest good sheets can get really pricey so these are very affordable and would make an awesome gift. Stain wise, anything we have ever gotten on these has come right out in one wash with no special treatment. That's just a bonus. I really want them in white next!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: I can't really rate these because they aren't what I ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't really rate these because they aren't what I want. The error was mine. I read a lot of the questions - there are over 300 - that people asked and many asked if it these sheets fit a flex-top king bed and people indicated they did. They do NOT work for a Flex-top King Bed. Flex-top means the top is split, but the bottom is NOT split. People are getting confused about this. A SPLIT KING is 2 separate twin mattresses and that is what these sheets are for. Flex-top = top split, bottom not. Split King = 2 twin beds.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: Bought these sheets because the reviews were amazing, in fact bought two sets. Brand new bed so needed new sheets to fit. Material was thin feeling straight out of the package. Washed in cool water and tumble dried on low. As I was making the bed I noticed that the sheets were ripped. Unfortunately I had to use them as I had no other sheets for the bed. I will be returning the other set as I didn't even bother to open them. I do not recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Stained Sheets
customer_reviews.text: So this is my 3rd pair of sheets they are very soft and comfortable. I bought some for my bed I loved them that I bought the other two for my kids but I had only bought the duvet so I decided to buy the sheets I am so dissatisfied this is how I received them I washed them hopeful that it would come out I am so disappointed I don’t know if I would buy from them again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest sheets ever made
customer_reviews.text: These sheets were soft but that was the only good thing about them. When I received them the elastic wasn't even sewn all the way so I sewed it by hand. Washed them once and they were shredding by the elastic again! Then after using them for about 3 weeks the fabric we slept on began to wear and tear. By far the cheapest sheets ever made and would not recommend them to anyone. Such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Robinson

customer_reviews.title: It changed my life...
customer_reviews.text: I use to have sheets that had purchased from Macy’s for my split king bed. I could not get into bed without one side popping off. It was so frustrating to have the sheets pop off with the slightest movement. I did some research and most of the options were very expensive. Couple websites had these sheets ranked high for use on split beds. Because these sheets were much lower price than most, I did not have high hopes for it. When I received them, I put them on. No matter what position the bed is in, these sheets do not pop off. Finally a good night sleep at a reasonable price. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: tomato king

customer_reviews.title: Cozy sheets but the fitted sheet...
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are super soft which is nice but the fitted sheet does not fit my 16 inch mattress. Corners come loose every night and I have to fix them the next day. I've had these for a little over a month and the elastic on the fitted sheet is going now too so it really doesn't stay on now. Anouther issue with the white sheets in particular is they are really thin so they are see through. Can see the logos from my mattress and pillows. I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dead_Guy

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SAUCE!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a company that seems to appreciate its customers. They follow up with emails and respond quickly. This is my second purchase of the same product (different color). This is because it fits my needs. They deliver on time. It's comfortable. It's easy to clean. The colors are vibrant. My only issue is that the pockets are too big for my adjustable bed's split king mattresses. However, this is easily remedied by tucking the edges further under (just a little exercise). If needed, I would not hesitate to purchase more sets from this company.
customer_reviews.author: ChasEC

customer_reviews.title: My go-to sheets.
customer_reviews.text: These have consistently been my go-to sheets. They are soft and pretty, they wash well and guests have always commented on their softness. Color is tricky because things don’t always appear as they are online but I bought the light blue this time and was very pleased, it’s not a bright glaring blue it’s very soft with maybe just a touch of turquoise making it yummy. I really like these sheets which have proven to hold well over time.
customer_reviews.author: Wendie B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: I always recommend these sheets! I have a dark blue set and a light blue set. They are soft, light but don’t feel cheap, I haven’t had any pilling or loose threads despite having 3 dogs who love to burrow in between the sheets when they can. They have held up ok after about a year of washes too, color hasn’t faded. Only issues I’ve had is with the light blue set developing like a sweat stain (Texas heat) and I have not been able to remove it despite soaking and washing. While not comparable to $200+ Wamsuta sheets quality, I haven’t owned any other sheets that measure up to these nestl ones. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ayla H.

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality - do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sheet set based on the good reviews from others and the "multiple stars" given by people. It's true - they are very soft. But these sheets are thin, flimsy, and very poorly made. After 3 weeks of use, and 3 washes, the bottom sheet is simply falling apart at the seams, and the sewn reinforcement edge with the elastic is tearing completely away from the thin, fragile sheet material. After 3 wash/use cycles, the sheets are no longer usable - complete junk.
customer_reviews.author: Lars G Grimsrud

customer_reviews.title: Used, returned and RESOLD "gasp"
customer_reviews.text: Sooo... I don't normally do this but unfortunately had no choice this time but will NEVER again!!! Lemme explain...I just bought a new home recently and with that a new bed...new size.. new comforter and ....you get the point. So New sheets 2 sets to start. Yes I generally wash them before I use them but our new lol washer and dryer was delayed so we had no W/D
customer_reviews.author: Colunga family

customer_reviews.title: Two Different Colors-In Different Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of Charcoal Gray sheet sets in Twin-XL. I received 2 sets of Twin-XL sheet sets. The problem was one set was in light gray, and appeared to possibly be a different brand. Labels and packaging were not the same, The light gray sheets, once unfolded looked like what I ordered, the Charcoal Gray, but not the same color. Couldn’t tell by sheet tags if they were even the same brand. Very disappointed since these are for 2 beds in the same room with identical comforters, but now two different colors.😱😢
customer_reviews.author: Robin E. Runyon

customer_reviews.title: What a find!
customer_reviews.text: Just completed a room re-do for our teenage son...went from the little kid bunk bed look to a young man full sized bed, new paint, bedding, etc. Went with a navy blue and burgandy theme. Needed durable sheets which came in the right color. These burgandy sheets are perfect! The color is true to burgandy. They are soft and comfortable. And, best of all they are "deep pockets" which means they fit the thick mattress we purchased. Would DEFINITELY buy again.
customer_reviews.author: joe-rktek

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: These are the first set of sheets I’ve ever owned that stay put! They have elastic all the way around the sheets (not just the corners like most) they wick moisture and stay at the perfect temperature for a good nights rest. I love these sheets so much I just bought a second back up set. I plan to buy sets of these sheets for every bed in the house. I would give them 5 stars but they developed a small thread pull line in the fabric after their second washing. That being said, I’m sticking to this brand, you can not beat the quality for such a LOW price!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Gore

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a few types of these sheets, but leaving review here. Put them on the bed after the first washing, and they were really soft and comfortable. The true measure of this for me was my rough feet did not catch on the fabric. After a few washes, they remain just as comfortable, great price of these. There is a star rating for wrinkle-free, which is strange, but no, these do not really hold up to a wrinkle-free class in my opinion; after one sleep, no amount of smoothing would truly work.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan N.

customer_reviews.title: Fitted sheet tore easily
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I receive these sheets I opened the package up and put the fitted sheet on my mattress. The elastic tore completely off of one corner and I didn’t even pull on it. I literally just tucked it under the mattress. I was shocked at how poor the sewing quality is!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Clifton

customer_reviews.title: They’re alright if you’re on a budget
customer_reviews.text: We got these sheets mostly because of the color and price. Unfortunately these microfiber sheets run pretty warm, we both run hot so we’ll probably have to mostly use them in winter. Also these have the most lax/loose elastic bands I’ve ever had on sheets -they barely have any tension . If you like your fitted sheet snug and tight this is not it. They did wrinkle but honestly we don’t care. Overall for the price they’re alright. At least they’re soft.
customer_reviews.author: Calireader

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly soft, comfortable sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about purchasing sheets online and more skeptical with some of those poor reviews, but decided to purchase these because of the majority of reviewers mentioning how soft these are. THEY TRULY ARE SOFT. I gave them a wash right out of the package based on the instructions on the tag and had no issues with them even after the dryer. I didn't think I preferred non-cotton sheets before, but these made me a believer! I would recommend these sheets to anyone (unless I didn't like the person).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Cool soft and comfortable. We love them. Also don’t pull off the mattress easily (we have split king adjustable bed). Update 1/17:20. Please don’t waste your money. Sheets don’t hold up. Felt fantastic but after only a couple washes in cold with delicate dry, they are a pilled mess. Please don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Orange? Not even close...  Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult to relay colors on a computer because it's so dependent on your monitor and settings but these Orange sheets are not even remotely close to the bright, vibrant orange shown in the pictures. They are at best a more brown or coppertone color. I was trying to match up the orange in a school color so I bought these specifically for how bright they looked in the pictures. What a disappointment. Would not call them orange no matter what I was trying to match.
customer_reviews.author: johnsland8

customer_reviews.title: Finally, Sheets for ADJUSTABLE BEDS -- for the $$$, can't be beat!
customer_reviews.text: Have not found a better price for a similar sheet ANYWHERE! Almost impossible to find sheets for adjustable beds without purchasing the sizing separately; ex, if for a king adjustable, purchasing two very deep twins, then sewing the two twin top sheets together. Really, it's a pain, and expensive. We did find one for sale in Oklahoma for paid over $200. The quality was good but, wow! It should be. For this price, we can purchase several backups, and definitely do not need 5 star quality. THANK YOU for offering this to the commoners!!!
customer_reviews.author: MrsB

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with microfiber sheets. I’ve slept on them for about 2 weeks and I’m slowing getting used to the feel. Personally, cotton sheets are more comfortable. I purchased them because of the low price, the array of colors and deep pockets. I picked the color orange hoping that it would match a new quilt that I purchased but the color name is a bit deceiving. The “orange” color is more of a burnt orange than a regular orange so I’m a little bit disappointed with that decision.
customer_reviews.author: Beef

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Sheets at reasonable cost
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of these sheets before and like them so much that I bought a second set for my full size bed, that needs deep sides to 14". These sheets for me are very soft and so far are wrinkle minimal coming out of the dryer. I prefer flannel sheets now, but the latest versions of flannel sheets shed endless tons of fuzz that gets all over. My last flannel sheets purchased from a high end company come out of the dryer with what seem to be permanent wrinkles. These sheets wash well and the first set is going very strong after several years of washing.
customer_reviews.author: A. Halter

customer_reviews.title: Really great sheets at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: We needed an extra set of sheets after retiring a few, and were just looking for a short term solution. However - the quality of these sheets pleasantly surprised us. They are soft, comfortable and appear to be durable enough that they'll be in the mix long term. We're probably going to be ordering more. The fit was perfect, they wash well, and resist wrinkles. I have no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: So I really read through all the reviews. Took in some of the advice and considered the cons. My matress is about a foot thick and these kept slipping off even with sheet holders. The threading was also coming off a little bit when I got them but I wasnt too worried I figured it's just extra thread. After 2 washes there was a tear. Not even at the seams
customer_reviews.author: myra rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars because of value at this price point. The yellow sheets I bought were pretty out of the pkg but I feel like they came to life after the first wash. Very soft fabric! So comfy. Fit my Sleep Number split king bed great. I can elevate the head and legs without the sheet popping off. Are they as durable as the $140 Sleep Number brand sheets? Probably not. But, at this price and quality I'm very happy. Just ordered a 2nd set.
customer_reviews.author: Veonn E.

customer_reviews.title: Nestl Sheets Are Perfect in Every Way
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first set of Nestl sheets (Queen size for our master bedroom) more than a year ago, and absolutely love them. They are incredibly easy to care for, fit the bed well, are wearing well, and are cool and very comfortable to sleep on. My husband has had no complaints, so that is a great testament how the excellence of these sheets. I recently purchased two more sets for use on two Full size futon mattresses. Our guests also found them to be very comfortable. I am thrilled to have found this brand and will continue to purchase Nestl sheets in future.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Ok sheets for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new king bed and needed sheets ASAP. I found these and gave them a try. They are thin and not super soft but they are fine. I do think they are well made, just not high quality if that makes sense. I have since ordered nicer sheets that we will use most of the time, but these are fine as a back up. I would use them on a guest bed that isn't used a lot since the price point is great, but I wouldn't recommend them for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: dogmom22

customer_reviews.title: i got these today, i was Looking for specifically ...
customer_reviews.text: i got these today, i was Looking for specifically a deep burgundy/wine red as pictured. for reference i have looked at this item on my phone as well as desktop and both pictures looked the same so i do not believe this is a issue with computer hue or saturation settings. what i received was a washed out red/salmon color they looked incredibly faded in the light and once they were in the bedroom with soft light they appear orange . i have added pictures for reference with a shirt that has the same color as the pictured item so you can see the difference. i will be returning these asap.
customer_reviews.author: robyn yvette

customer_reviews.title: Love the set
customer_reviews.text: I actually really like this set. I’m the type of person who dislikes fluffy comforters because they can get so hot in the summer. I tried this thing sheet and its so nice. The material is super thin so it keeps you safe from the night monsters but cool in the summer lol. The actual fitted sheet is great too. I have one of those thick mattress that rise up (kind of like a hospital bed) and the sheets stay put. The pillow covers are okay. I also have thick pillows and the pillow cases slip out. It’s not annoying because I do have thick pillows and I really can’t blame the seller for not adjusting to MY pillows
customer_reviews.author: BettySep

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of Sheets for Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how well these sheets are made. I did follow the instructions and immediately washed the sheets in cold water. The sheets came out nearly perfect - soft and wrinkle-free. They fit my king bed perfectly and aren't as see-through as some people have said. Maybe it's the color that makes the sheets "see-through." I'm very happy with my purchase and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: SatisfiedAmazoner

customer_reviews.title: Overall quality is good
customer_reviews.text: The mint is not as light as it looks in the picture, it’s a darker teal color which is why I took a star. I would have liked it to be a lighter mint color but the teal does kind of work with my room still so I kept it. The overall quality is good, I washed them first and didn’t have any issues. They aren’t too thick but aren’t too thin either which works well for me. I don’t normall sleep with the top sheet over me so as far as laying on they are soft and does what a sheet should do.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheets
customer_reviews.text: The deep pockets are legit. The color is beautiful and hold well when washed. I like the softness. I learned something with these sheets. I have an adjustable base. The sheets don’t stay in place throughout the night. I’ve learned that I will need to buy sheet suspenders/placement snaps. I think some of the negative reviews I read are frustrated people who like myself need a solution but don’t understand it’s not just about buying good sheets. I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these are wrinkle free, and yes they are soft. They are also so thin that you can literally see through them when you hold them up to even dim light. They are ok for the price but they will become my "emergency" sheets at the back of the linen closet. UPDATE ADDED: I bought these 9 months ago. The seams have come undone at the top of the flat sheet. I do launder them in accordance with instructions. Quality really is not great but for the price this should be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cool.
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are so cool to sleep on. Especially during warm Tuscan AZ nights. Beautiful color. They are very wrinkly when taken out of the dryer. Doesn't bother me but thought others should know in case it would bother them. I DO NOT iron sheets. Doesn't effect the softness or coolness or comfort. Main reasons I purchased them. Recommned.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these sheets. They are super soft, love the color and sort of wrinkled free. If you take them out of the dryer and put them right on the bed then yes, they are awe wrinkle free. What makes me sad is that they are defective. Was folding the flat sheet and found a hole. Have only had the sheets for a month. Sheets are expensive (split king). Was really hoping that I found a decent company. Hopefully the company will read this..will post later if the problem is resolved. Will send an email to the company.
customer_reviews.author: nadine urban

customer_reviews.title: Magenta is more Muted "Mauve"
customer_reviews.text: These sheets, you guys. So soft, so easy to clean, no static in the dryer (worst part about microfiber), and neither chilly nor sweaty. Holy grail sheets! I purchased these in hopes they would coordinate with some velvet accent pillows I have - they don't match but they're so soft and cozy I don't *really* care. I will re-order in the "hot pink" and see if those match better. These are amazing and when washed with my brand new white linen duvet cover (risky, I know) there was no color transfer, no damage. My favorite part? They don't attract every cat hair in the world! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more colors!
customer_reviews.text: Love how deep pocketed they are that they were able to fit perfectly my mattresses. It is hard to find deep pocket sheets in stores that are affordable. I bought different colors and am happy with my purchase! They are of great material and no issues so far..
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied buyer in Orlando, FL

customer_reviews.title: Good sheets but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: These are fairly normal sheets. I like the color a lot. The main reason I bought them was because they were supposed to be "deep pocketed". I have a mattress topper on my bed and regular sheets always pop off and it's super annoying. These sheets do that less often, but definitely still do and are absolutely not as deep pocketed as I thought they would be. Overall I like them, but if you're looking for extra deep pocketed sheets like I was then maybe look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Carney

customer_reviews.title: Lovely sheets but fitted not as big as touted
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the sheets to match a duvet cover which we really like. Some pix show deep coverage on the underside of the mattress which shows the sheet really does stay put. It is good but not great. Bummer. What would a few more inches cost? But the whole package is pretty and comfortable and the lavender is beautiful. Love the feel of the fabric and it has a nice, subtle sheen. Very pleasant. Also LOVE Nestl's customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi T.

customer_reviews.title: NICE, SOFT, & COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: THESE SHEETS ARE AS ADVERTISED, WILL SEE HOW THEY RE-ACT AFTER WASHING. I HAVE PURCHASED WHAT SEEM TO BE THE EXACT SAME SHEETS UNDER DIFFERENT NAMES. BECAUSE OF THE HIGH THREAD COUNT, THEY SEEM TO FEEL WARM. SINCE WE RUN THE A/C 24-7 ITS NOT A PROBLEM. THIS 1800 THREAD COUNT SHOULD WORK QUITE NICE IN THE WINTER TIME. THE ONLY OBSERVATION I HAVE NOTICED IS ONE OF MY PILLOW CASES CAME APART AT THE SEAMS.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES W.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased to see that, unlike other microfiber sheets I've purchased, the corners of the fitted sheet actually have a seam like other fitted sheets. The elastic goes all the way around the sheet, but the seams make the corners fit better. I also love the wide ranging choice of colors and the extra effort to put a nice border on the flat sheet and cases instead of just a hem. I will definitely buy more of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make Sure You Order The Right One!
customer_reviews.text: If you're ordering these sheets for a sleep number bed, be careful! There's a difference between a Split Top King and a Flex Top King. Make sure you're ordering the right ones. I didn't and had to send them back but they were very well made and super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Pahrump5

customer_reviews.title: Color not as expected, thin
customer_reviews.text: These cheats are okay to change up in. I ordered the orange sheets (especially because of the bold/vibrant color). However, I immediately noticed that they were of a rust orange color (colors were dull). I'm going to keep them because I hate sending things back during the pandemic. The sheets are a little thin but not a major problem for my son he is always hot so light and airy is good for him.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bearrr

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong for the price. I bought 3 sets as I decided to get rid of my old mismatched sets and and other sets I no longer used. These sheets were perfect replacements for the summer. I’ve paid upwards of close to $300 for adjustable bed (Split King) sheets and was just as happy. Except for a few small features, I.e. Thinness, Beautiful Pillow Case half trim, etc..
customer_reviews.author: LOJ

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: One use and the stitching holding the fabric of the sheet to the elastic band around the edge is coming loose causing the band to separate from the sheet material. If you want a good, one use, disposable sheet set then this is the one you are looking for....fill up those landfills. If you want something that is going to last, move along and keep searching Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Hippolytus

customer_reviews.title: Second Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these sheets. I eventually want to get them in every color. They are fantastic quality and keep me cool in the summer and warm in the winter. You don't struggle to put them on deep mattresses and wrestle with the fitted sheets like other brands. I have some other high quality expensive sheets and these in comparison are softer and don't shrink up after washing them. I highly recommend them as I have had multiple sets for over a year and have not seen any change in quality or fading. They are a fantastic bargain and don't sacrifice quality.
customer_reviews.author: RobinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fits snug on 10” memory foam!!!
customer_reviews.text: My memory foam mattress is 10” deep and the sheets fit snug probably not good for a deeper mattress but they are very soft and I literally just had the chance and to wash them and put them on...they are wrinkle resistant definitely...I wish the pillow cases were king size, but I did order a matching body pillow case and it is perfect! I recommend just be aware of how thick your mattress is!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie 333

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Ad picture showed 2 pillowcases, lead line to buy said pillowcases missed small print, disappointed receiving only one pillowcase... most people use more than one pillow especially folks who buy for adjustable beds... just received today will add to review after washing and fitting sheets on adjustable bed... so far so good !!! tyvm... these are very feel good, soft, comfortable sheets to sleep on... elastic is not taut enough on bottom sheet to fit tight enough prevent sheet creeping , have to readjust with every use. this is on Twin extra long adjustable bed... other than shorted on only one pillow case and this sheet creeping, quite pleased with material comfort. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered light brown, received dark brown. Packaging even read light brown. As other reviews indicated, I should have listened to the reviews, the sheets do not fit as expected. And also had the odd spotting after washing, showing up even more on the dark chocolate coloring. You definitely get what you pay for. I emailed the company and of course they would accept a return. Too much trouble for me for the price. So they refunded me 5%, $1.63. Won't be ordering from this company for sheets again.
customer_reviews.author: Kpinson

customer_reviews.title: HYPO-ALLERGENIC SHEETS
customer_reviews.text: I like the Nestl Deluxe Bed Sheet Set overall! This set here was the Full XL 4 piece set which includes one flat sheet (81"×104"), one fitting sheet (54"x80"), & two pillowcases (20"x30")! The sheets are hypo-allergenic, silky soft touch, long lasting, stain resistant, & wrinkle free! They also have some really fun colors to choose from - I went with the mint color!
customer_reviews.author: WilliamTop Contributor: Country Music

customer_reviews.title: 2 star overall rating
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these sheets for my queen size bed , I am just warning if you want the pink set that is shown on amazon is so not the color but a bright hot deep pink to almost a red , so I give a 2 stars for faults advertisement , but I gave 5 star for softness and winkle free and I know this very well cause I bought sets for my son and wife and daughter for xmas 2019 and they love them ..
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Soft but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sheets in the Radiant Orchid Purple color, and it is a beautiful, happy color. They are indeed soft and wrinkle free, but I’ve only washed them twice and they’re starting to shed bits of material.
customer_reviews.author: Koribobori

customer_reviews.title: They actually fit and stay on
customer_reviews.text: I already own many sets of sheets, but I bought these because I wanted to see if there was a set with fitted sheets for my adjustable bed that actually stayed on when I put the head of the bed up. These are THOSE sheets. After trying one out, I bought 2 more sets and my OLD sets of sheets are getting donated to charity. I only wish that the flat sheet would be a bit wider...but otherwise, I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheets for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that these sheets would be this nice considering the low price. They are very soft, beautiful colors and fit well on my adjustable bed. Slept on last night and they stayed on well. Deep corners. Haven’t washed them yet, but I really like them. And at that price if they wear out a little sooner than others, that’s ok too.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, dated, terrible
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how these get such good reviews. I'm not a sheet snob in the slightest, I think this is literally the first set of sheets I've ever bought outside of a discount store, or the $10 sheets at Target. They're also easily the worst sheets I've ever owned. The material is thin, the stitching is shoddy (I didn't go looking for it, it's just so bad that I noticed it when putting it on the bed), the piping detail is dated, the pillowcases take on an odd smell the day after being washed. They're terrible, literally the only good thing i have to say about them is that the charcoal color is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee R

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Did not even get to use them one time the elastic in the fitted sheet broke when making the bed the 1st time after washing them. If I could give a 0 I would, did not even get to use 1 time, epic failure, but again you get what you pay for. They are very thin, for this price point that is expected. If you are reading this... it’s up to you, do you trust all the 5 stars? Would I buy again, hell no.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Cozy!
customer_reviews.text: As a reference, I am a 20 year old college student so I don’t necessarily have the most knowledgeable experience in the bed sheet world. With that being said, I wanted something that fit my budget and provided pretty colors. To me, these sheets are wonderful; they’re super soft and feel heavenly. I love the color- it’s light and came how I expected it to look like. I definitely plan on buying more sets!
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: So thin! I wish I bought costco's bed sheet set
customer_reviews.text: It's so thin, I'm disappointed. You can see the pattern of my mattress through BOTH the flat sheet and fitted sheet. Also for some reason the white color does not match nestl's other product --;duvet set. So my bed is also different shades of white :/ picture attached is the pattern through one layer of bed sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Good Packaging, Color as Expected, Nice Softness
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Affordable and efficient. Customer service team is good. Only thing to be aware of is that the pillow cases are indeed make for a 'king size pillow' too, which should be obvious. but most pillows are not king size so you'll need to fold them effectively, hem them, or buy king size pillow (which you'll probably need anyway, it will look much better on a king bed).
customer_reviews.author: sajohnson6

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: I got these sheets during amazon deals for $19.99. Not that I expected much, but I didn’t expect the elastic that goes in the corners to help keep the sheet on to completely pull apart as I was putting them on the bed. I mean, they still get the job done I already washed them otherwise I’d return them. But I mean at least it’s a spare set of sheets, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: They Feel Wonderful!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased these for the bed my granddaughter will sleep in when she visits. Beside the beautiful teal color, these sheets feel so nice to the touch. (I haven't slept on them but maybe after she leaves, I will just to see how comfy they are!) They came out of the dryer looking great. I am very pleased initially and hope my granddaughter will be too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a Split King and got one Twin Extra Long sheet and one Full size sheet
customer_reviews.text: We bought these sheets in anticipation of the delivery of our new bed. Unfortunately we did not open the package until after the return date passed. We should have gotten two Twin XL fitted sheets with this split king order, but we got 1 Twin XL fitted sheet and 1 Full size fitted sheet. Since it was too late to return, and we needed something to sleep on, we have been awkwardly using them for now. It is too bad because the color is great, and they are very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: James Ranger

customer_reviews.title: And they hold up!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are the best I have purchased and used in the last 40 years for the money. I have slept on these for 4 months and they are very comfortable and soft, fit snug with deep pockets, and hold up great thru multiple washes. They are great during colder months, a bit warm in summer, but not terrible. I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Edju

customer_reviews.title: Comfy soft and nice color grey
customer_reviews.text: OK my son liked the feel of these so well that he didn’t want to get out of bed. they are a decent thickness and fit true to size. On fitted sheets I always get a size larger just because they usually pop up on the corners if I don’t... so a queen size was purchased for a full-size bed and is quite perfect considering the mattress is deeper than a typical standard mattress
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Nestl Bedding Review
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new set of sheets to use with our new 3" mattress pad. Although the Amazon write up seemed to be indicate they would be large enough, when they arrived they appeared smaller than advertised. Being stubborn I put them on the bed anyhow and was pleasantly surprised to find that they fit. It is important that the mattress pad is as close to equally spaced on all sides. The sheets are very comfortable, hold their color and size well as long as they are washed according to the instructions. Other than that, the price range was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph F, Rumpf

customer_reviews.title: Fitted sheets / Top sheets great, Pillowcases are  WAY TO LARGE!!
customer_reviews.text: I agree with all the positive reviews regarding quality, softness,ect. However,In my personal experience of ordering a long set, the fitted sheet & top sheet got great...but the pillowcases are HUGE! I have regular,basic ,king size pillows, & these pillowcases are way to large.Looks ridiculous & sloppy.I have to safety pin the top & sides in order to make it seem like it fits. So bad..I even googled such thing as an xl long pillow,to no avail, but thats how desperate I was.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: A bed full of awesomeness!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these sheets for our queen bed and took a chance on the color, fearing the lavender color would not quite fit my husbands color preference. Well these are a beautiful color....soft and fresh. I washed them and put them on our bed and they are incredibly soft! They fit our queen size bed perfectly, with the deep pockets to cover my mattress topper....and everything stays in place. I recently made a quilt that has lavender color accents and will tell you my bed is delightful. I crawl into bed early just to snuggle between the cool, crisp sheets on a hot summer night. You will be pleased with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CherylTop Contributor: Quilting

customer_reviews.title: PerfectvSheets, Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly as promised--and better than I hoped. We needed sheets for our adjustable set of extra long twin mattresses. The salesman had told us we would have to buy two sets of twin EL sheets. Making the bed that way was a nightmare, and it looked like one when you finished making it! I wanted to try the California King sheets, I didn't want to spend a great deal until I knew if they would work, these sheets fit the ticket--AND the bed. Plus, they were much nicer than I expected, especially for such a reasonable price. I'm very happy with the sheets, the color, and the swift delivery. I recommend this seller highly.
customer_reviews.author: Sloopy

customer_reviews.title: Its like sleeping in heaven
customer_reviews.text: These are the worlds best sheets! These fit my adjustable bed perfect I can put the head and feet part up without the sheets coming undone. The best thing about the sheet are how unbelievably soft they are. It literally feels like you're sleeping on butter. They are so soft and comfortable I will never buy sheets anywhere else again. They should be treated 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my sons bed, I was looking for something comfortable and with deep pockets. This bedding met my expectation. When we were putting the fitted sheet on for the first time, I noticed a hole where the elastic wasn’t attached to the material. I had received an email from the company asking about my purchase because they wanted to ensure customer satisfaction. I emailed back letting them know about my concern and within a couple of days, we had a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Anne J.

customer_reviews.title: Soft but thin, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are definitely super soft, and the color is just about spot on, but they are quite thin. Some people might not mind the thinner sheets, but it makes me question how long they'll last. I had an issue with defective stitching on the fitted sheet, and I contacted ComfortZone about a replacement sheet. They impressed me by sending a whole new set within two days. Overall the sheets are a soft, colorful set that I think would be great for a dorm or apartment. Had I realized how thin they were, I probably wouldn't have bought them for my own bedroom, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I threw these sheets in the wash as soon as they arrived, and they are just as soft as they were out of the package. You should always be hesitant about buying bedding online without being able to touch it, which is why I rely on reviews like this before purchasing. You will see this product has the highest reviews, and they are completely accurate. These sheets are great. I bought them in two colors, and they look exactly the same as in the photos. The two colors in my photo are the taupe and the gold. Can’t reccomend these enough!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha R.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I have had these sheets on his bed for over a year now - Since May 2018. They are the only sheets for his bed. He takes them off and washes them and puts them back on. So for continuous use they have held up exceptionally well. Just today I noticed they are starting to pill so it's time to replace them. Buy these sheets and you know they will last a long long time. They are also very soft and comfortable. They are also pet proof.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Deep pockets are great for adjustable beds!
customer_reviews.text: The eggplant is a very, dark purple. Not quite the color I wanted but I knew I was taking a chance, it's difficult to find the exact shade I want. I bought this because I recently bought an adjustable bed and my old sheets kept popping off the corners. The depth of my mattress doesn't fit what typically requires deep pocket sheets, but with the movement of the bed; I thought it would be worth a try. So far it has worked great! The new sheet has not popped off the corners even once. I will probably be purchasing more of these soon.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: They are absolutely fantastic. The color is vibrant
customer_reviews.text: I received these sheets much quicker than I expected, which is always a plus in my book. They are absolutely fantastic. The color is vibrant, they are extremely soft and after washing they are virtually wrinkle free. They are amazing! I also ordered a set in lavender, beautiful, simply, beautiful. Love them and will be ordering more soon. The best sheets I have ever had, and I'm 60++ years old!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Gee

customer_reviews.title: Not smooth feeling or cooling, lot of pilling
customer_reviews.text: When they arrived I immediately put my hand in the package to feel the texture. It was terrible! Warm and not smooth, tons of fabric pilling, looked similar to feather. Felt like thin flannel. Not sure why it has good reviews. Back to my more expensive cool and smooth sheets! I gave 1 star for the color, hitch was just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Defective item.  Company unresponsive.
customer_reviews.text: Insanely soft, but feels flimsy. After the first (recommended) wash there was a separation of the elastic on the fitted sheet, and a small bundle of threads on the flat sheet. The seams on the pillowcases seemed to shrink and made ironing mandatory (no pic of that, sorry) I tried for a week to contact Nestl at the only email address i could find and have gotten no response. I have accepted Amazon's replacement and will be returning these. I will update this review for the new sheets
customer_reviews.author: C. Moseley

product_meta.title: Nestl Deep Pocket Twin XL Sheets: 3 Piece Bed Sheets with Fitted Sheet, Flat Sheet, Pillow Cases - Extra Soft Microfiber Bedsheet Set with Deep Pockets for Twin XL Sized Mattress - Silver Gray
feature_bullets: 3 PIECE BEDSHEETS: Luxury deep pocket sheet sets for twin xl mattresses include one 39 x 80 inch fitted sheet, one 66 x 102 inch flat sheet, and one 20 x 30 inch pillowcases with a modern 3-line design.

DEEP POCKET DESIGN: Suitable for mattresses with a depth of 14 - 16 inches, the deep pocket fitted sheet has a stretchable elastic lining to be ideal for use with memory foam toppers or mattress pads.
UNBELIEVABLY SOFT: To achieve hotel-quality, our sheets are tightly woven using 1800 thread count microfiber fabric that is double brushed on both sides to be softer than Egyptian and organic cotton.
SUPERIOR FABRIC QUALITY: In addition to our sheets having a high thread count, the silky microfiber fabric is breathable, hypoallergenic, and wrinkle-free to deliver a clean, freshly made bed look.
44 VIBRANT COLORS: Nestl twin xl size bed linens are available in silver gray as well as 43 other stunning colors and are fade-resistant to maintain their color even after multiple washes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars24,953 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 100% LIFETIME GUARANTEE - Netsl Bedding is a different kind of company that prides itself in providing the absolute best customer service in the industry. If for any reason you decide that this bed sheet set is not for you, send 1 simple email and receive a 100% money-back refund, absolutely no questions asked!
